verses.verse: Now the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> gathered <S%H6908><s%> together all <S%H3605><s%> their armies <S%H4264><s%> to Aphek, <S%H663><s%> while the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> were camping <S%H2583><s%> by the spring <S%H9407><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

And the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were proceeding <S%H5674><s%> on by hundreds <S%H3967><s%> and by thousands, <S%H505><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H376><s%> were proceeding <S%H5674><s%> on in the rear <S%H314><s%> with Achish. <S%H397><s%>

Then the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> [are] these <S%H428><s%> Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> [doing here]?" And Achish <S%H397><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> "Is this <S%H2088><s%> not David, <S%H1732><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H834><s%> has been <S%H1961><s%> with me these <S%H2088><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> or <S%H176><s%> [rather] these <S%H2088><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and I have found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> fault <S%H3972><s%> in him from the day <S%H3117><s%> he deserted <S%H5307><s%> [to me] to this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>?"

But the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were angry <S%H7107><s%> with him, and the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Make the man <S%H376><s%> go <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> that he may return <S%H7725><s%> to his place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> you have assigned <S%H6485><s%> him, and do not let him go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> with us, lest <S%H3808><s%> in the battle <S%H4421><s%> he become <S%H1961><s%> an adversary <S%H7854><s%> to us. For with what <S%H4100><s%> could this <S%H2088><s%> [man] make <S%H7521><s%> himself acceptable <S%H7521><s%> to his lord <S%H113><s%>? [Would it] not [be] with the heads <S%H7218><s%> of these <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H376><s%>?

"Is this <S%H2088><s%> not David, <S%H1732><s%> of whom <S%H834><s%> they sing <S%H9420><s%> in the dances, <S%H4246><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Saul <S%H7586><s%> has slain <S%H5221><s%> his thousands, <S%H505><s%> And David <S%H1732><s%> his ten <S%H7233><s%> thousands <S%H7233><s%>'?"

Then Achish <S%H397><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "[As] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> lives, <S%H2416><s%> you [have been] upright, <S%H3477><s%> and your going <S%H3318><s%> out and your coming <S%H935><s%> in with me in the army <S%H4264><s%> are pleasing <S%H2896><s%> in my sight; <S%H5869><s%> for I have not found <S%H4672><s%> evil <S%H9567><s%> in you from the day <S%H3117><s%> of your coming <S%H935><s%> to me to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Nevertheless, you are not pleasing <S%H2896><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the lords. <S%H5633><s%>

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore return, <S%H7725><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> in peace, <S%H7965><s%> that you may not displease <S%H6213><s%> <S%H7451><s%> <S%H5869><s%> the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>"

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Achish, <S%H397><s%> "But what <S%H4100><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%>? And what <S%H4100><s%> have you found <S%H4672><s%> in your servant <S%H5650><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> when <S%H834><s%> I came <S%H1961><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that I may not go <S%H935><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against the enemies <S%H340><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>?"

But Achish <S%H397><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> "I know <S%H3045><s%> that you are pleasing <S%H2896><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> like an angel <S%H4397><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> nevertheless <S%H389><s%> the commanders <S%H8269><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have said, <S%H559><s%> 'He must not go <S%H5927><s%> up with us to the battle. <S%H4421><s%>'

"Now <S%H6258><s%> then arise <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> with the servants <S%H5650><s%> of your lord <S%H113><s%> who <S%H834><s%> have come <S%H935><s%> with you, and as soon as you have arisen <S%H7925><s%> early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> and have light, <S%H215><s%> depart. <S%H1980><s%>"

So David <S%H1732><s%> arose <S%H7925><s%> early, <S%H7925><s%> he and his men, <S%H376><s%> to depart <S%H1980><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%> And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up to Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>
